title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Currently we are destroying any chance of recovery from the coming ice-age, simply because we are adding to it with all our global warming and climate change correction attempts. Ice-age warnings have been sent out since ... ages ago. The original hard-covered science-fiction book "Fallen Angels" by Larry Niven, talked about the coming ice-age in a science-fiction format. But at the end of the book was listed a great big bibliography of all kinds of scientists who showed why the ice-age is coming.Solar researcher warns of solar activity decrease, imminent MINI ICE AGE and GLOBAL FAMINE by 2030https://www.naturalnews.com/2023-10-06-researcher-warns-mini-ice-age-famine-by-2030.htmlA Ukrainian solar researcher with a solid academic background has been warning about a dangerous phenomenon that could lead to dramatic climate and weather changes as well as global cooling for years now. Her studies have become controversial over the years because she blames climate changes on the sun's activity and not anything carbon dioxide-related.In a 2019 interview with the award-winning Canadian journalist Stuart McNish on his program "Conversations That Matter," Valentina Zharkova, who authored world-leading research as well as numerous groundbreaking publications, explained that they have been observing signs that since 2015, solar activity has been decreasing in a manner only seen during the Grand Solar Minimum, which last occurred during the Maunder Minimum, also known as the "prolonged sunspot minimum," 400 years ago.She cited National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), and other research organizations have noted this trend in various ways but hid the information from the public. According to her, the significantly reduced solar activity will inevitably lead to dramatic climate and weather changes such as a massive global cooling that could be likened to a mini ice age. (Related: NO WARMING AT ALL: Global COOLING continues for eighth straight year, according to NOAA data.)"Between cycle 25 and 11 years of cycle 26 [the least active cycle], and between cycle 26 and 27, will be the coldest period on Earth, and we will feel it through a lack of vegetation," the researcher and lecturer with a doctorate in astrophysics said. This means that starting after the active period during the 'Solar Cycle 25,' from the second half of this decade until the early 2050s, Earth will experience exceptional cold, extreme weather, earthquakes, and volcanic eruptions. Zharkova pointed to 2030 as the year when it will seriously begin, warning that the 2030s will be so cold that it will result in a severe food shortage. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JyyuouPSNEA...

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I personally think it is unlikely to happen, but do not mind me, I am not a scientist.Assuming this is a trustworthy theory and indeed we are supposed to expect the planet to cool down to the point of food becoming more scarce, what would our solution be?Perhaps implement more sources or energy which are not dependent on the climate, like nuclear energy or geothermic? Are we supposed to try and stockpile food and develop new types of farms which can withstand the low temperatures which will come? People are rather concerned over high temperatures than low ones, if you have been paying attention.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: What people are concerned over high temperatures? Certainly not the people living on the streets of Chicago or New York City in the winter, and freezing to death.In case you haven't noticed, it's people who are listening to the blab by the media that there is global warming. They simply repeat the blab in their conversations, because they were trained by the media. And the media was influenced by the One-World Elite who are using the climate change idea to control people.If any Elite were serious about global warming, all they would have to do is influence the government to nuke a couple of big ocean volcanoes into activity. The dust and ashes spewed from these volcanoes would cloud the skies, and the lack of sun-heat would allow the whole planet to become colder. It happened twice in the 1800s. One of them was Krakatoa.Quote from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KrakatoaSummer temperatures in the northern hemisphere fell by an average of 0.4 °C (0.72 °F) in the year following the eruption.Nobody is doing this. There is no global warming. CO2 is not a problem because if there is too much of it, plants simply use it to make food for themselves to grow.The point is that global warming is not a problem. We could handle it if it were. But there is nothing we can do if the scientifically accurate global cooling happens, except to bundle up and hope for a return of global warming.
